author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٣٩) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الإِنْسانِ ﴾
لا تَتْرُكْ أَوامِرِي حُبًّا لِجَمَالِي، وَلا تَنْسَ وَصَايَايَ ابْتِغاءً لِرِضائِي.
translation:
(39) O SON OF MAN!
Neglect not My commandments if thou lovest My beauty, and forget not My counsels if thou wouldst attain My good pleasure.
